title: Causes and effects of 1968 French crisis

content.question: This question is designed to test your ability to work with and understand historical documents. Write an essay that: Provides an appropriate, explicitly stated thesis that directly addresses all parts of the question and does NOT simply restate the question. Discusses a majority of the documents individually and specifically. Demonstrates understanding of the basic meaning of a majority of the documents. Supports the thesis with appropriate interpretations of a majority of the documents. Analyzes the documents by explicitly grouping them in at least three appropriate ways. Takes into account both the sources of the documents and the authors’ points of view. Analyze the causes of and responses to the 1968 crisis in France.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
